dao.ImplJPA
Class GenericDaoJpa<T extends DtoSuperClass>

java.lang.Object
  dao.ImplJPA.GenericDaoJpa<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Класс объектов, которые участвуют в операциях с базой данных
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGenericDao<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminDBJpaController, CityJpaController, ClientJpaController, CommentsPetJpaController, FindingPetJpaController, GoodHandsJpaController, PetJpaController, StaffJpaController, StatemateJpaController
public abstract class GenericDaoJpa<T extends DtoSuperClass>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGenericDao<T>

Класс, реализующий все методы интерфейса IGenericDao для работы с БД, используя JPA. От данного класса наследуються все классы ДАО. В нем реализуються все основные операции которые должны быть реализованы во всех ДАО, а именно: сохранение, удаление, поиск по id, выборка всех элементов.

executeQuery

protected <REZ> REZ executeQuery(java.lang.String queryOrQueryName,
                                 boolean namedQuery,
                                 boolean singleResult,
                                 java.lang.Object... parameters)
                    throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException

This template method executes query with performing all needed operations, like creating EntityManager, creating transaction, committing, or rolling it back.

Methods sets parameters for the query as they appear in the parameters list, by number starting from 1. So, the first parameter in your named query should be referenced as ?1, second as ?2 and so on.

If singleResult = true and no result is found, then null is returned.

Be aware, that when multiple results are returned, they are being dynamically casted to REZ class. It should be able to cast to List. When returning single result, REZ should be a single persistent entity class.

Type Parameters:
REZ - Class of the result
Parameters:
queryOrQueryName - Query string or NamedQuery name
namedQuery - Specifies, whether query is named query
singleResult - Specifies, whether single result should be returned
parameters - Parameters. You can specify multiple parameters separated by comma
Returns:
Result of the query
Throws:
javax.persistence.PersistenceException - If error occurs
